title: 崩溃报告!!求助!!
author: qwe53719
txt_content:
SERVER开启后就崩溃了
---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// I just don't know what went wrong :(

Time: 2017/7/24 上午 11:38
Description: Exception in server tick loop

java.lang.NoSuchMethodError: com.gildedgames.aether.common.items.misc.ItemMoaFeather.getColorName(Lnet/minecraft/item/ItemStack;)Ljava/lang/String;
        at com.gildedgames.aether.common.items.misc.ItemMoaFeather.func_77667_c(ItemMoaFeather.java:97)
        at com.gildedgames.aether.common.items.misc.ItemMoaFeather.func_77653_i(ItemMoaFeather.java:111)
        at net.minecraft.item.ItemStack.func_82833_r(ItemStack.java:508)
        at net.minecraft.item.ItemStack.func_151000_E(ItemStack.java:957)
        at net.minecraft.stats.StatList.func_75925_c(StatList.java:201)
        at net.minecraft.stats.StatList.reinit(StatList.java:343)
        at net.minecraftforge.common.ForgeModContainer.mappingChanged(ForgeModContainer.java:471)
        at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke0(Native Method)
        at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(Unknown Source)
        at sun.reflect.DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(Unknown Source)
        at java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Unknown Source)
        at com.google.common.eventbus.EventSubscriber.handleEvent(EventSubscriber.java:74)
        at com.google.common.eventbus.SynchronizedEventSubscriber.handleEvent(SynchronizedEventSubscriber.java:47)
        at com.google.common.eventbus.EventBus.dispatch(EventBus.java:322)
        at com.google.common.eventbus.EventBus.dispatchQueuedEvents(EventBus.java:304)
        at com.google.common.eventbus.EventBus.post(EventBus.java:275)
        at net.minecraftforge.fml.common.LoadController.sendEventToModContainer(LoadController.java:243)
        at net.minecraftforge.fml.common.LoadController.propogateStateMessage(LoadController.java:221)
        at net.minecraftforge.fml.common.Loader.fireRemapEvent(Loader.java:1059)
        at net.minecraftforge.fml.common.registry.PersistentRegistryManager.injectSnapshot(PersistentRegistryManager.java:357)
        at net.minecraftforge.fml.common.FMLContainer.readData(FMLContainer.java:327)
        at net.minecraftforge.fml.common.FMLCommonHandler.handleWorldDataLoad(FMLCommonHandler.java:418)
        at net.minecraft.world.storage.SaveFormatOld.loadAndFix(SaveFormatOld.java:118)
        at net.minecraft.world.storage.SaveHandler.func_75757_d(SaveHandler.java:121)
        at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.func_71247_a(MinecraftServer.java:224)
        at net.minecraft.server.dedicated.DedicatedServer.func_71197_b(DedicatedServer.java:266)
        at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.run(MinecraftServer.java:431)
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)

replies.author: lilinjie
replies.txt_content: gildedgames 这个mod出错了，百度了下它是以太II的前置

replies.author: ItIsEnderman
replies.txt_content:
崩溃报告后半段呢？
目前只能看出是AetherII及其附属存在异常
建议把完整的崩溃报告发过来

replies.author: 冰冻の小溢
replies.txt_content: 可以输入一下这个指令来解决你这个问题的/fml confirm

replies.author: 天若晴
replies.txt_content: mod错了 删了mod输入 /FML confirm
